text: James Beeland "Jim" Rogers, Jr. (born October 19, 1942) is an American businessman, investor and author. Rogers is the Chairman of Rogers Holdings and Beeland Interests, Inc. He was the co-founder of the Quantum Fund and creator of the Rogers International Commodities Index (RICI). ==References== ==Other websites== *The Millennium Adventure, Official Jim Rogers website *Jim Rogers News Blog *Jim Rogers Latest News Hedge Journals *Jim Rogers blog *The Fall-in-Love Fortune Cookie Singapore ver 2min8sec Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Alabama Category:Businesspeople from Baltimore Category:Writers from Alabama Category:Writers from Baltimore
title: Jim Rogers
